analysis.description:
Reentrancy in DatCrowdPreSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x3f0624d68a16f19428584333c1871cdfba0ba870.sol#342-361):
	External calls:
	- token.transferFromContract(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3f0624d68a16f19428584333c1871cdfba0ba870.sol#354-355)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/5/0x3f0624d68a16f19428584333c1871cdfba0ba870.sol#355-356)

Reentrancy in DatCrowdPreSale.transferTokensManual (/unique_chucks/5/0x3f0624d68a16f19428584333c1871cdfba0ba870.sol#367-378):
	External calls:
	- token.transferFromContract(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3f0624d68a16f19428584333c1871cdfba0ba870.sol#373)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/5/0x3f0624d68a16f19428584333c1871cdfba0ba870.sol#374-377)

DatCrowdPreSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x3f0624d68a16f19428584333c1871cdfba0ba870.sol#342-361) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFromContract(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3f0624d68a16f19428584333c1871cdfba0ba870.sol#354-355)
